entry.title: $2400 // Nicely renovated apartment on the Bushwick / BedStuy border!
entry.content:
ID: 19325

Nicely renovated apartment on the Bushwick / BedStuy border. 2 queen sized bedrooms on opposite ends of the apartment, nice natural light, and central a/c, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. All of this just steps to the Flushing J/M trains and tons of restaurants, bars, and more.

AMENITIES
Central A/C
Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
Stone countertops

***Please text Vaner at five-1-six-two1-eight-17-three-nine and mention specific ad you're referring to. I'm a real person who can help you find your perfect apartment. I also have plenty of other listings in the same neighborhood, just ask! Foreign applicants welcome, we take insurent and or multiple months paid up front.
